mapper.select: SELECT email,first_name,middle_name,last_name,first_name_kana,middle_name_kana, last_name_kana,first_name_kanzi,last_name_kanzi,visa_date,country_name,visatype_name FROM visa_user_info INNER JOIN country_master ON visa_user_info.country_id = country_master.country_id INNER JOIN visatype_master ON visa_user_info.visatype_id = visatype_master.visatype_id WHERE visa_user_info.delete_flag = 0;
SELECT email,role_name FROM visa_login INNER JOIN role_master ON visa_login.role_id = role_master.role_id
